conversation.text: For a Massachusetts movie recommendation, I suggest watching "The Scarlet Letter" (1850). It tells the story of Hester Prynne, who faces judgment and societal rejection in 17th-century Massachusetts. Starring Ralph Ferrer and Claire Danworth, this classic adaptation captures the essence of the region's history and struggles.
